lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls acquired the rights to the former D.C. United midfielders Dema Kovalenko and Shawn Kuykendall yesterday in exchange for a partial player allocation. Kovalenko spent seven years in Major League Soccer, including three with United, before playing this year with FC Metalurh Zaporizhya in his native Ukraine.
